title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Camping There are 2 campgrounds at Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park. Also, located just outside of the park boundary is East Portal Campground within Curecanti National Recreation Area. Read More      Food There are no restaurants within Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park. A variety of restaurants are in Montrose, 14 miles away from the South Rim. Small pre-packaged snacks may be available at the South Rim Visitor Center, but we recommend purchasing snacks prior to your visit.      Lodging No lodging is available in Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park other than campgrounds. Lodging is available in nearby communities. Please visit the following links for more information: Montrose Visitor and Convention Bureau Gunnison Country Chamber of Commerce Gunnison-Crested Butte Tourism Association
